flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=17>>17 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 17-3=<<17-3=14>>14 more ceilings to paint.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
